entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 1:55 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
